Class DrawingTool

java.lang.Object
  DrawingTool

public class DrawingTool
extends java.lang.Object

Class drawingTool - enable a user to create multiple pens and draw on canvas using it. Accept commands from user and accordingly make changes on canvas.

Version:
2016.12.1

Constructor Detail

DrawingTool

public DrawingTool()
Prepare to draw on a canvas of default size. The pen starts up at position (0, 0) and its colour is black.

DrawingTool

public DrawingTool(int width,
                   int height)
Prepare to draw on a canvas of specified size. The pen starts up at position (0, 0) and its colour is black.

Parameters:
width - The canvas width.
height - The canvas height.
